1.「止まれ！| このような場に なんの用だ。: Stop! What do you want with a place like this?

2.<cs_pchero>は ミルフィからのメッセージを|ルベンという人物に 届けに: <cs_pchero> informed him that he had come to|deliver a message from Millefi to someone|named Reuben.

3.「ミルフィからか……私が ルベンだ。| よし 話を聞こう。こちらに来てくれ。: It's Milfi...I'm Reuben. All right, let's hear|what he has to say. Come with me.

4.「フフフ。身動きは おろか 声も出せないだろ。| さっそくだが キミの相棒は ど: Huh. You can't move, let alone make a sound.|Now, where's your partner? Nelim, if I may...

5.「おや？ 事態を のみ込めていない？: Hmm? You don't understand what's going on?

6.<pipipi_high>「おお！ どうか 愛しのルベンに| 私の死を 伝えてく: <pipipi_high>Oh! Please tell my beloved Reuben|of my death...kkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk|kkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk.

7.「あの依頼人のミルフィは 私だよ。| シロートにしては 迫真の演技だったろ？: That client Milfie is me. That was a very|convincing performance for Sirot, wasn't it?

8.「最初に名乗った ルベンというのも 偽名でね。| 本当の名は ギスマイヤーという: My first name, Reuben, was also a pseudonym.|His real name is Gismeyer. I was very careful.

9.「さてと……用があるのは ネリム君のほうでね。| 一緒だと 思い込んでいたが……: Well... it's Nelim who wants to see you. I|assumed you'd be with me, but... well, if|you're not here, I'll just use you as bait.

11.「えへへ～ 気になって 追ってきちゃった。| ルベンさんて この人かな？: Hehehe~ I got curious and followed you. Is|this the person you are referring to, Mr.|Reuben?

12.「そうだよ。キミが ネリム君だね。| じつに いいタイミングだ。| キミに 頼み: That's right. You must be Nelim. Very good|timing. I have a favor to ask you.

13.「この本はね 死霊の書と呼ばれる| 特別な書物だ。しかも 由緒ある血筋の者……|:
This book is a special book called the Book of|Dead. Moreover, it can only be opened by those|of a venerable lineage...those who have|
|inherited the book.

14.「かねてから 継承者を見つけだそうと| デスマスターが 近寄りそうな場所に| 地:
For some time now, I've been steadily applying|the art of detection to places where death|masters might approach in an attempt to locate|
|the heir...

15.「それで つい先日 発見に至ったのだが| 継承者のキミが デスマスターでなかった:
So, it wasn't long ago that we made the|discovery that you, the heir apparent, were|not the death master! No wonder we couldn't|
|find you for so long!

16.「ねえ <cs_pchero>。なんか ヤバそうだし| 用がすんでるなら 早いと: Hey, <cs_pchero>. It looks like something's|wrong, so if you've done what you have to do,|let's get out of here.

17.<if_woman>「おっと <cs_pchero>君が 帰れるかどうかは| キ: <if_woman>Oh, and whether or not <cs_pchero> can|return is up to you. Unseal the Book of Dead.|Then I will set her free.<else>Oh, and whether or not <cs_pchero> can|return is up to you. Unseal the Book of Dead.|Then I will set him free.<endif>

18.「はぁ？ なに言ってくれてんの アンタ。| アタシを おどしてんの？: Huh? What are you talking about? Are you|scaring me?

19.「まあまあ。そう 怖いカオ しなさんなって。| カンタンなことさ。ただ この本を: Oh, well. Don't be so scared, my dear. It's|easy. All you have to do is open this book.

20.「封印してあるってことはさ……コレ| かなり ヤバイ本なんじゃないの？| 協力な: If the book is sealed, doesn't that mean it's|a very bad book? There's no way I can|cooperate.

22.「あー もうッ！ わかったよ。| アタシが こいつを ひらくと同時に| アンタも: Oh, God! I get it. As soon as I open this, you|should release your <cs_pchero> too!

23.「おお！ やった！ やったぞ！！| 何人たりとも ひらけなかった 死霊の書が|: Oh! We did it! We did it! The Book of Dead,|which no one had ever been able to open,|finally opened.

24.「残念だよ ネリム君。死霊の書は| ひらこうとする者の命を 奪うというが| よも:
I am sorry, Mr. Nelim. They say that the Book|of Dead will take the life of anyone who tries|to open it, but I'm surprised that it would|
|stop even the heir to the throne.

25.「だがね 私の好みで言えば 生きてるキミより| 死んでるキミのほうが 断然 美し: But you know, for my taste, you are much more|beautiful dead than alive.

26.「ゾクゾクするよ！ 狂おしいほどにッ！: It's tingling! It's driving me crazy!

27.「ひとつの死体だけでも こんなにも| 美しいのだから 何百何千という死体に| も: One corpse alone is so beautiful, if it were|surrounded by hundreds or thousands of|corpses....

28.「現実味のない話に 聞こえるかな……。| この 死霊の書さえあれば 死者の王国を: I don't mean to sound unrealistic, but with|this Book of Dead, it's quite possible to|build a kingdom of the dead.

29.「うたがっているのかい？| なら ひとつ 実演してみせよう。: Are you singing? Then let me give you a|demonstration.

30.「現世にうごめく 怨霊よ！ 亡者の魂よ！| この地に埋もれた 死肉に宿り| 今一: O grudge that haunts this world! Souls of the|departed! Dwell in the dead flesh buried here,|and rise once more as spirits of the dead!

31.「<cs_pchero>君 しばしの別れだ。| 次に会うときは キミを死霊として: <cs_pchero> This is a short farewell. Next|time we meet, I will summon you as Summon|Dead.

32.<cs_pchero>は ネリムの なきがらを抱えて|デズリンの待つ家に 戻った: <cs_pchero> returned to Deathlin's house|with the unctuous remains of Nelim...

34.「ああ……わたくしが この子を| 行かせてしまった ばっかりに……: Oh... it's my fault for letting her go...

35.「<cs_pchero>さん 何があったか| 話してくださいますね？: <cs_pchero> You will tell us what happened,|won't you?

36.「い…依頼者が ギスマイヤーだったなんて……| あの者は 死霊の書の 封印を解こ: I can't believe that the request form was|Gismeyer...the one who was trying to find the|heir to unlock the seal of the Book of Dead.

37.「怨霊を 死肉に宿らせる 禁忌の書。| 記したのは ネリムちゃんの遠い祖先です。:
It is a forbidden book that makes the grudge|dwell in the flesh of the dead. It was written|by a distant ancestor of Nelim. Therefore,|
|this child is the heir to the book.

38.「書は 代々 継承されていったのですが| どこかの時点で 盗難にあい……| 巡り: The book was passed down from generation to|generation, but at some point it was stolen...|and passed around the world to Gismeyer.

39.「わたくしの家系は 継承者を守りつつ| 紛失した書を探す役目を になっていました: My family was tasked with finding the lost|book while protecting its heirs.

40.「しかし 一族は衰え わたくしの先々代で| すでに 継承者の家系は デスマスター:
However, the family was in decline, and the|line of heirs had already passed from the|position of death master in my previous|
|generation.

41.「かわいそうな ネリムちゃん……この子は| 偉大なる祖先のことも 死霊の書のこと: Poor little Nelim...this child was murdered|without knowing a single thing about his great|ancestors or the Book of Dead.

44.「……ひとつ 腑に落ちなかったのは| 継承者であるはずのネリムちゃんが 死霊の書:
One thing that didn't make sense to me was the|fact that Nelim, who was supposed to be the|heir, fell down after opening the Book of|
|Dead.

45.「著者は 悪用を恐れ 継承者以外の者が| 書を ひらこうとすれば 絶命する呪法を:
It is said that the author was so afraid of|misuse that he had a spell placed on the book|that would kill anyone who tried to crack it|
|except for his heirs.

46.「ネリムちゃんは 継承者ではあるけれど| デスマスターではない。この 中途半端な: Nelim is an heir but not a death master. This|half-assed state may have been the cause of|her falling into a coma...

47.「いったん わたくしのほうで ネリムちゃんを| 覚醒させる手段を 探してみます。: I will try to find a way to awaken Nelim.

48.「それと……こちらは 危険な事態に| 巻き込んでしまったことへの お詫びを込めた: Also... this is my way of apologizing for|putting you in harm's way. Please accept it.

49.「ネリムちゃんを救う方法が 見つかったら| そのときは ぜひ 協力してくださいね: If you find a way to save Nelim, please help|us then.
